tool_description: Evaluates and scores the condition of property components based on standardized criteria, providing consistent ratings across different inspectors and properties.

component_type.description: Type of component being assessed: roof, foundation, electrical, plumbing, HVAC, windows, doors

component_age.description: Estimated age of the component in years

maintenance_history.description: Known maintenance history: excellent, good, fair, poor, unknown

error_messages: Invalid component type: Use one of [roof, foundation, electrical, plumbing, HVAC, windows, doors].
Empty observations: Provide at least one observation for assessment.
Invalid component age: Age must be a non-negative integer.
Invalid maintenance history: Use one of [excellent, good, fair, poor, unknown].
usage: Specify the component_type being assessed, provide detailed observations array, input component_age, and optionally include maintenance_history for more accurate scoring.

condition_score.description: Numerical condition score from 1-10 (10 being excellent)

condition_rating.description: Categorical rating: excellent, good, fair, poor, critical

remaining_useful_life.description: Estimated remaining useful life in years

priority_level.description: Maintenance priority: immediate, short-term, medium-term, long-term

assessment_summary.description: Brief summary of the condition assessment
